originalText.text: This company is horrible. They charged my account $698 instead of $6.98. I was told that they would give me two months of beauty boxes free and a Walmart gift card due to their mistake.  It took them 5 months finally contact me back & ONLY because I sent them two more emails asking where my gift card and boxes were.   This company is so trashy and unprofessional!

originalText.text: An FCC & FTC complaint has been filed for breach of privacy, invalid information, breach of code of ethics and inappropriate conduct with this company and one of its customer care employees in particular. Please contact me if you are interested in joining the civil suit due to similar circumstances.

originalText.text: This company is a joke.  They put out a Walmart/Brandshare Subscription box (they provide products and billing, Walmart provides the packing and shipping).  Besides the boxes having the same old boring products over and over and over again, this company’s customer service is nonexistent.  Recently, instead of billing me $6.98 for my box, they billed me $698.00!  Now you would think that this would be an easy fix right - just call Brandshare Customer Service and have the charges reversed.  WRONG!!  Their 1-800 customer service (and I am using that term very loosely) consists of a recording saying send us an email.  After making this type of error with thousands of accounts the correct and right thing to do would have been to oh I don’t know maybe answer your phone?  They left me and I am sure thousands more quietly having a nervous breakdown over an incorrect $700 charge to my credit card while they dodged actually speaking to their customers.  If you are considering doing any type of business with this company that will involve customer service - don’t, just don’t!

originalText.text: To start it took weeks to get a response to my emails. So now how does someone get a reasonable employee to solve an issue? I canceled the Walmart Beauty Box a year ago and thought that was it, then suddenly I was charged again in November after about a year with no activity. I contacted Brandshare customer service on multiple occasions only to get basically the same response over and over “your account was still active so no refund” although not verbatim you get the point. I explained over and over to the same customer service representative that I canceled but she refused to refund the charge. Wouldn’t a reasonable person assume that a service has been canceled if in a year there is no activity? Of course they would but not your representative she kept saying it wasn’t canceled but now she says its canceled so it won’t happen again, oh ok how convenient but you still keep my money. Interestingly you didn’t  charge me or send me a Beauty Box for about a year then out of the blue you start sending them again even though I did not request it? This is Just awful customer service, I will not do business with this company again. Ironically I found other online reviews of others that have the same issue. So people don’t you think there is an issue here? How about just doing the right thing and take care of the customer, since isn't high quality customer service one of the things you specialize in?
